body_html: We (Vertex.AI) have just open sourced PlaidML, our deep learning stack with support for running Keras on OpenCL. TensorFlow support is coming, help there would be welcome. And yes, Mac support is on the way (also Windows). http://vertex.ai/blog/announcing-plaidml @ggaabe
body_text: We (Vertex.AI) have just open sourced PlaidML, our deep learning stack with support for running Keras on OpenCL. TensorFlow support is coming, help there would be welcome. And yes, Mac support is on the way (also Windows). http://vertex.ai/blog/announcing-plaidml @ggaabe
body: We (Vertex.AI) have just open sourced PlaidML, our deep learning stack with support for running Keras on OpenCL. TensorFlow support is coming, help there would be welcome. And yes, Mac support is on the way (also Windows). http://vertex.ai/blog/announcing-plaidml @ggaabe
